main_definition: Connected or associated with something else, often used to describe two things that are linked together.

meanings_and_examples.example: In many industrial processes, machines are coupled to work more efficiently.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A pair of things that go together or function as a unit.
meanings_and_examples.example: The coupled wheels on my bicycle ensure smooth rides.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Associated with another factor, especially in the context of relationships or partnerships.
meanings_and_examples.example: When discussing climate change, carbon emissions are often discussed as coupled to economic growth.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving two items that have a strong connection or dependency on each other.
meanings_and_examples.example: The success of the project was coupled with effective teamwork and leadership.
